original_text: So ye abode in Kadesh many days, according unto the days that ye abode there.
korean_text: 너희가 가데스에 여러 날 동안 머물렀나니 곧 너희가 그 곳에 머물던 날 수대로니라

sentences.original_text: So ye abode in Kadesh many days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희는 가데스에서 여러 날을 머물렀다

sentences.original_text: according unto the days that ye abode there
